collection_page.p: The STEP Module and Resource Library (SMRL) includes the following documents:

ul.li: modular &tr-application-protocols;: members of the &tr-application-protocol; series of parts (ISO 10303 parts 201 to 299) that conform to the modular architecture;
&tr-application-module; series of parts: ISO 10303 parts 401 to 499 and 1001 to 1999;
&tr-application-interpreted-construct; series of parts: ISO 10303 parts 501 to 599;
&tr-integrated-resource; series of parts: ISO 10303 parts 41 to 199;

collection_page.p: Each part belonging to the SMRL is maintained as a separate ISO document. However, the individual parts belonging to the SMRL will not be sold or distributed separately; they will only be sold and distributed as part of a package consisting of the entire SMRL. The SMRL product contains a top-level structure that provides navigation indices for the parts that are included in the SMRL.
The modular APs make use of the &tr-application-modules; and &tr-AICs; and &tr-IRs; in the SMRL.
Other &tr-APs; make use of the &tr-AICs; and &tr-IRs;.
